xyz.izaak.radon.world

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.izaak.radon.world.Camera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transformable

    public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transformable
    An object which is capable of rendering a view of a Scene from a certain perspective.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      A builder class for Camera objects

              org.joml.Vector3f up)
        Constructs a new Camera object
        Parameters:
        nearPlane - the near plane of this Camera
        farPlane - the far plane of this Camera
        aspectRatio - the aspect ratio of this Camera
        fov - the FOV of this Camera
        eye - the eye of this Camera
        look - the look vector of this Camera
        up - the up vector of this Camera

    • Method Detail

      • registerShader

        public static void registerShader(Shader shader)
        Registers a Shader which can be used by Camera objects to render Primitive objects. A shader will be chosen for each Primitive based on its Material.
        Parameters:
        shader - the Shader to register

      • setGlPosition

        public static java.lang.String setGlPosition()
        Returns:
        GLSL code which sets the value of gl_Position according to the orientation and parameters of this Camera

      • compileAndRegisterShader

        public static void compileAndRegisterShader(ShaderCompiler shaderCompiler)
        Like registerShader(Shader), except taking a ShaderCompiler instead and invoking its compile() method to generate a Shader to be registered.
        Parameters:
        shaderCompiler - a ShaderCompiler which will compile a Shader to be registered

      • builder

        public static Camera.Builder builder()
        Returns:
        a Camera.Builder object

      • get

        public float get(int parameterIndex)
        Get a numeric parameter of this Camera.
        Parameters:
        parameterIndex - one of NEAR_PLANE, FAR_PLANE, FOV, or ASPECT_RATIO.
        Returns:
        the value of the specified parameter

      • getEye

        public org.joml.Vector3f getEye()
        Returns:
        the eye vector of this Camera

      • capture

        public void capture(Scene scene)
             throws RadonException
        Performs a forward rendering pipeline to render a Scene. Invokes OpenGL's drawArrays method for each component of each Primitive of each Entity in a Scene, rendering it to the currently bound Framebuffer (for example, the application window). Each Primitive will be rendered with an appropriate shader for its Material if one has been registered.
        Parameters:
        scene - the scene to render
        Throws:
        RadonException - if anything detectable goes wrong during rendering
